sentences.en: A bibliography is a list of books and / or other materials.
sentences.cn: 书目是书和(或)其他资料的目次表.

sentences.en: A bibliography of recommended reference texts are listed below the table.
sentences.cn: 在表下还列出推荐参考书目.

sentences.en: A complete bibliography has run to several thousand entries.
A scholastic work is to have a useful bibliography at the end of each chapter or the whole book.
sentences.cn: 学术著作应该在每一章或全书之后附有一份参考书目.

sentences.en: At the end of this chapter there is a select bibliography of useful books.
sentences.cn: 本章末尾列有一份有用的精选书目。

sentences.en: It'should be formatted as a regular article with title, abstract, and bibliography.
sentences.cn: 文章应像正规论文一样包括题目 、 摘要和参考书目.

sentences.en: The article is consist of preface, straight matter text, conclusion, Bibliography.
sentences.cn: 全文由前言 、 正文 、 结论和后记组成.

sentences.en: The book ought to include a bibliography of the subject.
sentences.cn: 这本书应包括一份关于这一学科的参考书目.

sentences.en: The production of this bibliography is totally automated.
sentences.cn: 这个目录的编制过程全是自动化的.

sentences.en: The scholar compiled a bibliography of the unpublished writings of Emerson.
sentences.cn: 这位学者编制了一部爱默生未发表的作品的目录.

sentences.en: The study of printing and the physical evidence of the books themselves is called analytical bibliography.
sentences.cn: 对于印刷和书籍的物理数据本身的研究称为分析目录学.

sentences.en: The subject of the bibliography was due to arrive in fifteen minutes.
sentences.cn: 这份目录的主人再有十五分钟就该到了.

sentences.en: There is a useful bibliography at the end of each chapter.
sentences.cn: 在每一章后附有一份有用的参考书目.

sentences.en: This course features an extensive annotated bibliography in the study materials section.
sentences.cn: 这门课的特色在它的研究资料有许多广泛注释的参考书目.

sentences.en: We have quoted in the bibliography a large number of items.
sentences.cn: 文献目录中列举了大量文献.

words.tran_cn: 书目的；书籍解题的；著书目录的
书目的；书籍解题的；著书目录的

trans.tran_en: a list of all the books and articles used in preparing a piece of writing
